[Home](./index.md) &gt; [@contract-case/case-plugin-base](./case-plugin-base.md) &gt; [providePluginContext](./case-plugin-base.provideplugincontext.md)

## providePluginContext() function

Overwrites the value of '\_case:currentRun:context:pluginProvided' with the provided context. Generally you want to call this once per interaction executor entry function.

**Signature:**

```typescript
providePluginContext: (parentContext: MatchContext, providedContext: Record<string, string>) => MatchContext
```

## Parameters

<table><thead><tr><th>

Parameter


</th><th>

Type


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

parentContext


</td><td>

[MatchContext](./case-plugin-base.matchcontext.md)


</td><td>

Context to extend with provided context


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

providedContext


</td><td>

Record&lt;string, string&gt;


</td><td>

Context that your plugin is providing


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>

**Returns:**

[MatchContext](./case-plugin-base.matchcontext.md)

A copy of the context, with the given plugin-provided context set.
